Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Leave the search bar empty. 3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: The page should reload to display all products, or prompt user to enter a search term. System should not display an error.

Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Type '   Blue Top   ' (with extra spaces) into the search bar. 3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: Search should correctly trim spaces and find 'Blue Top'.

Test Case Name: Search query at maximum length (e.g., 255 chars)
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Type a very long string (e.g., 255 'a' characters) into the search bar. 3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: System should handle the long query without crashing. Either find results if keywords match, or display 'No Results Found'.

Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Attempt to type a string longer than allowed (e.g., 256 'a' characters) into the search bar. 3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: Input field should prevent typing beyond max length, or display a validation error. Search should not process the oversized query.
